item.title: Difficulty Tiers
item.description: How hard is stuff? Stuff can be hard. Stuff can also be easy. Some things here are hard. Some things are easy. Let’s define some difficulty tiers. Easy / Basic No worries here, folks! Everything should be done with a GUI with maybe some stuff needing a command or two, or maybe just editing some text files. Instructions should come in picture form. Operating systems in this tier are Ubuntu Linux, Windows, or OS X.
